alert.note: Alert for Kosciusko (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 25 at 3:53PM EDT until June 25 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM EDT FOR KOSCIUSKO COUNTY... At 353 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Warsaw, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Warsaw, Winona Lake, Mentone, Silver Lake, Etna Green, Leesburg, Claypool, Burket, Sidney, Monoquet, Hoffman Lake, Atwood, Palestine, Beaver Dam Lake, Packerton, Sevastopol, Clunette and Beaver Dam. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for north central Indiana. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
